description: Atualize seu status do Discord com Rich Presence mostrando sua atividade.

commands.title: Enable Discord Presence in the current workspace.
Disable Discord Presence in the current workspace.

discordrp.statusBarText.description: Text to show on status bar.

discordrp.clientID.description: The Application Client ID to use Rich Presence with.

discordrp.enabled.description: Controls if Discord Rich Presence is active.

discordrp.reconnectThreshold.description: Decides how often a reconnect attempt should be made before stopping.

discordrp.details.description: Custom string for the details section of the Rich Presence.

discordrp.detailsIdle.description: Custom string for the details section of the Rich Presence when idling.

discordrp.workspace.description: Custom string for the state section of the Rich Presence.

discordrp.workspaceIdle.description: Custom string for the state section of the Rich Presence when idling.

discordrp.workspaceNotFound.description: Custom string for the state section of the Rich Presence when no workspace is found.

discordrp.largeImage.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the Rich Presence.

discordrp.largeImageIdle.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the Rich Presence when idling.

discordrp.smallImage.description: Custom string for the smallImageText section of the Rich Presence.
